r-script.source: enc <- read.delim(file="temp_encounters.txt") pat <- read.delim(file="temp_patients.txt") dia <- read.delim(file="temp_diage.txt") df <- data.frame(Param="Sex", table(pat$sex)) # TODO more counts write.table(x=df, file="counts.txt", row.names=FALSE, eol="\r\n", sep="\t" fileEncoding="UTF-8");
